Title: Koyaanisqatsi
Writer: Ron Fricke (scenario), Godfrey Reggio (scenario), Michael Hoenig (scenario), Alton Walpole (scenario), Jacques Ellul (inspiration/ideas), Ivan Illich (inspiration/ideas), David Monongye (inspiration/ideas), Guy Debord (inspiration/ideas), Leopold Kohr (inspiration/ideas)
Actors: Marilyn Chambers, Lou Dobbs, Ted Koppel
Plot: A collection of expertly photographed phenomena with no conventional plot. The footage focuses on nature, humanity and the relationship between them.
